verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1607><s%> As He Was Going Forth <S%G846><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Temple <S%G2411><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> Of His Disciples, <S%G846><s%> Teacher, <S%G1320><s%> See, <S%G1492><s%> What <S%G4217><s%> Stones <S%G3037><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> What <S%G4217><s%> Buildings! <S%G3619><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Answering <S%G611><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Seest Thou <S%G991><s%> These <S%G3778><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Great <S%G3173><s%> Buildings? <S%G3619><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Not At All <S%G3361><s%> Shall Be Left <S%G863><s%> Stone <S%G3037><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> , Stone <S%G3037><s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Which <S%G3361><s%> Shall Not Be Thrown Down. <S%G2647><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> As Was Sitting <S%G2521><s%> He <S%G846><s%> Upon <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Mount <S%G3735><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Olives <S%G1636><s%> Opposite <S%G2713><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Temple, <S%G2411><s%> Asked <S%G1905><s%> <S%G846><s%> ' Him <S%G2596><s%> Apart <S%G2398><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> James <S%G2385><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Andrew, <S%G406><s%>

Tell <S%G2036><s%> Us <S%G2254><s%> When <S%G4219><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> Shall Be? <S%G2071><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sign <S%G4592><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> Should Be About <S%G3195><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> To Be Accomplished? <S%G4931><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Answering <S%G611><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> Began <S%G756><s%> To Say, <S%G3004><s%> Take Heed <S%G991><s%> Lest <S%G3361><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> Mislead. <S%G4105><s%>

<S%G4183><s%> For Many <S%G1063><s%> Will Come <S%G2064><s%> In <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3686><s%> My Name, <S%G3450><s%> <S%G3004><s%> Saying, <S%G3754><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Am He, 1510 V-PXI-1S And 2532 CONJ Many 4183 A-APM They Will Mislead. 4105 V-FAI-3P

<S%G3752><s%> But When <S%G1161><s%> Ye Shall Hear Of <S%G191><s%> Wars <S%G4171><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Rumours <S%G189><s%> <S%G4171><s%> Of Wars, <S%G3361><s%> Be Not Disturbed; <S%G2360><s%> It Must Needs <S%G1163><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Come To Pass, <S%G1096><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> Not Yet Is <S%G3768><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> End. <S%G5056><s%>

<S%G1453><s%> For Shall Rise Up <S%G1063><s%> Nation <S%G1484><s%> Against <S%G1909><s%> Nation <S%G1484><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> Against <S%G1909><s%> Kingdom; <S%G932><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> There Shall Be <S%G2071><s%> <S%G4578><s%> Earthquakes <S%G2596><s%> In Different Places, <S%G5117><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> There Shall Be <S%G2071><s%> Famines <S%G3042><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Troubles. <S%G5016><s%> Beginnings <S%G746><s%> Of Throes Are <S%G5604><s%> These. <S%G5023><s%>

<S%G991><s%> But Take Heed <S%G1161><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> To Yourselves; <S%G1438><s%> <S%G3860><s%> For They Will Deliver Up <S%G1063><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Sanhedrims <S%G4892><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Synagogues : <S%G4864><s%> Ye Will Be Beaten, <S%G1194><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Before <S%G1909><s%> Governors <S%G2232><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Kings <S%G935><s%> Ye Will Be Brought <S%G2476><s%> <S%G1752><s%> For My Sake, <S%G1700><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> A Testimony <S%G3142><s%> To Them; <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Nations <S%G1484><s%> Must <S%G1163><s%> First <S%G4412><s%> Be Proclaimed <S%G2784><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Glad Tidings. <S%G2098><s%>

<S%G3752><s%> But Whenever <S%G1161><s%> They May Lead Away <S%G71><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> <S%G3860><s%> Delivering You Up, <S%G3361><s%> Be Not Careful Beforehand <S%G4305><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Ye Should Say, <S%G2980><s%> Nor <S%G3366><s%> Meditate Your Reply; <S%G3191><s%> ' <S%G235><s%> But <S%G3739><s%> Whatever <S%G1437><s%> May Be Given <S%G1325><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> That <S%G1565><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Hour, <S%G5610><s%> That <S%G5124><s%> Speak; <S%G2980><s%> <S%G3756><s%> For Not <S%G1063><s%> Are <S%G2075><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> They Who <S%G3588><s%> Speak, <S%G2980><s%> But <S%G235><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Holy. <S%G40><s%>

<S%G3860><s%> And Will Deliver Up <S%G1161><s%> Brother <S%G80><s%> Brother <S%G80><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Death, <S%G2288><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> Child; <S%G5043><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Will Rise Up <S%G1881><s%> Children <S%G5043><s%> Against <S%G1909><s%> Parents, <S%G1118><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Will Put To Death <S%G2289><s%> Them. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Ye Will Be <S%G2071><s%> Hated <S%G3404><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> On Account Of <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3686><s%> My Name; <S%G3450><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But He Who <S%G1161><s%> Endures <S%G5278><s%> To The <S%G1519><s%> End, <S%G5056><s%> He <S%G3778><s%> Shall Be Saved. <S%G4982><s%>

<S%G3752><s%> But When <S%G1161><s%> Ye See <S%G1492><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Abomination <S%G946><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Desolation <S%G2050><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Was Spoken Of <S%G4483><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> Daniel <S%G1158><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> , Prophet, <S%G4396><s%> Standing <S%G2476><s%> Where <S%G3699><s%> <S%G3756><s%> It Should Not <S%G1163><s%> he Who <S%G3588><s%> Reads <S%G314><s%> Let Him Understand, <S%G3539><s%> Then <S%G5119><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Judea <S%G2449><s%> Let Them Flee <S%G5343><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Mountains, <S%G3735><s%>

He <S%G3588><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Housetop <S%G1430><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Let Him Come Down <S%G2597><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> , House, <S%G3614><s%> Nor <S%G3366><s%> Go In <S%G1525><s%> To Take <S%G142><s%> Any Thing <S%G5100><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3614><s%> His House; <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He That <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Field <S%G68><s%> <S%G5607><s%> Is <S%G3361><s%> Let Him Not Return <S%G1994><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The Things <S%G3588><s%> Behind <S%G3694><s%> To Take <S%G142><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2440><s%> His Garment. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3759><s%> But Woe <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Those That <S%G1722><s%> <S%G1064><s%> Are With Child <S%G2192><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Those That <S%G3588><s%> Give Suck <S%G2337><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Those <S%G1565><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Days! <S%G2250><s%>
<S%G4336><s%> And Pray <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2443><s%> That <S%G3361><s%> May Not Be <S%G1096><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5437><s%> Your Flight <S%G5216><s%> In Winter; <S%G5494><s%>

<S%G2071><s%> For Shall Be In <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2250><s%> Those Days <S%G1565><s%> Tribulation, <S%G2347><s%> Such As <S%G3634><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Has Not Been <S%G1096><s%> The Like <S%G5108><s%> ' From The <S%G575><s%> Beginning <S%G746><s%> Of Creation <S%G2937><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Created <S%G2936><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Until <S%G2193><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Now, <S%G3568><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Not At All <S%G3361><s%> Shall Be; <S%G1096><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1487><s%> Unless The <S%G3361><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Had Shortened <S%G2856><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2250><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Days, <S%G302><s%> There Would Not Have Been Saved <S%G4982><s%> Any <S%G3956><s%> Flesh; <S%G4561><s%> But <S%G235><s%> On Account Of <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Elect <S%G1588><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> He Chose, <S%G1586><s%> He Has Shortened <S%G2856><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Days. <S%G2250><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Then <S%G5119><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> Say, <S%G2036><s%> Behold, <S%G2400><s%> Here Is <S%G5602><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> , Behold, <S%G2400><s%> <S%G1563><s%> There, <S%G3361><s%> Ye Shall Not Believe It. <S%G4100><s%>

There Will Arise <S%G1453><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> False Christs <S%G5580><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> False Prophets, <S%G5578><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Will Give <S%G1325><s%> Signs <S%G4592><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Wonders, <S%G5059><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Deceive <S%G635><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Possible <S%G1415><s%> Even <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Elect. <S%G1588><s%>
<S%G5210><s%> But Ye <S%G1161><s%> Take Heed : <S%G991><s%> Lo, <S%G2400><s%> I Have Foretold <S%G4280><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> All Things. <S%G3956><s%>

' But <S%G235><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Those <S%G1565><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Days, <S%G2250><s%> After <S%G3326><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2347><s%> That Tribulation, <S%G1565><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sun <S%G2246><s%> Shall Be Darkened, <S%G4654><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Moon <S%G4582><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Shall Not Give <S%G1325><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Light <S%G5338><s%> Her; <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Stars <S%G792><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%> Shall Be <S%G2071><s%> , Falling Out, <S%G1601><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Powers <S%G1411><s%> Which Are <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heavens <S%G3772><s%> Shall Be Shaken; <S%G4531><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Then <S%G5119><s%> Shall They See <S%G3700><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Man <S%G444><s%> Coming <S%G2064><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Clouds <S%G3507><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> Power <S%G1411><s%> Great <S%G4183><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Glory; <S%G1391><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Then <S%G5119><s%> He Will Send <S%G649><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G32><s%> His Angels, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Will Gather Together <S%G1996><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1588><s%> , His Elect <S%G846><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Four <S%G5064><s%> Winds, <S%G417><s%> ' From The <S%G575><s%> Extremity <S%G206><s%> Of Earth <S%G1093><s%> To The <S%G2193><s%> Extremity <S%G206><s%> Of Heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

<S%G575><s%> But From <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Fig Tree <S%G4808><s%> Learn <S%G3129><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Parable : <S%G3850><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> Of It <S%G846><s%> Already <S%G2235><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Branch <S%G2798><s%> Tender <S%G527><s%> Is Become, <S%G1096><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> It Puts Forth <S%G1631><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Leaves, <S%G5444><s%> Ye Know <S%G1097><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Near <S%G1451><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Summer <S%G2330><s%> Is. <S%G2076><s%>

So <S%G3779><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Ye, <S%G5210><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> Ye See <S%G1492><s%> Coming To Pass, <S%G1096><s%> Know <S%G1097><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Near <S%G1451><s%> It Is, <S%G2076><s%> At The <S%G1909><s%> Doors. <S%G2374><s%>

Verily <S%G281><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3756><s%> In No Wise <S%G3361><s%> Will Have Passed Away <S%G3928><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1074><s%> This Generation, <S%G3778><s%> <S%G3360><s%> Until <S%G3739><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> Shall Have Taken Place. <S%G1096><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth <S%G1093><s%> <S%G3928><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Shall Pass Away, <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3056><s%> But My Words <S%G3450><s%> <S%G3756><s%> In No Wise <S%G3361><s%> Shall Pass Away. <S%G3928><s%>

<S%G4012><s%> But Concerning <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2250><s%> That Day <S%G1565><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Hour, <S%G5610><s%> No One <S%G3762><s%> Knows, <S%G1492><s%> Not Even <S%G3761><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Angels <S%G32><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Heaven, <S%G3772><s%> Nor <S%G3761><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5207><s%> Son, <S%G1487><s%> But <S%G3361><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Father. <S%G3962><s%>

Take Heed, <S%G991><s%> Watch <S%G69><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Pray; <S%G4336><s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1492><s%> For Ye Know Not <S%G1063><s%> When <S%G4219><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Time <S%G2540><s%> Is, <S%G2076><s%>

As <S%G5613><s%> A Man <S%G444><s%> Going Out Of The Country, <S%G590><s%> Leaving <S%G863><s%> <S%G3588><s%> House <S%G3614><s%> His, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Giving <S%G1325><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1401><s%> To His Bondmen <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Authority, <S%G1849><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Each One <S%G1538><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2041><s%> His Work, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Doorkeeper <S%G2377><s%> Commanded <S%G1781><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> He Should Watch. <S%G1127><s%>

Watch <S%G1127><s%> Therefore, <S%G3767><s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1492><s%> For Ye Know Not <S%G1063><s%> When <S%G4219><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Master <S%G2962><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> House <S%G3614><s%> Comes : <S%G2064><s%> At Evening, <S%G3796><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> , At Midnight, <S%G3317><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> At Cock Crowing, <S%G219><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Morning; <S%G4404><s%>
Lest <S%G3361><s%> Coming <S%G2064><s%> Suddenly <S%G1810><s%> He Should Find <S%G2147><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> Sleeping. <S%G2518><s%>
<S%G3739><s%> And What <S%G1161><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> I Say, <S%G3004><s%> To All <S%G3956><s%> I Say, <S%G3004><s%> Watch. <S%G1127><s%>
